abstract: Q&A addresses how Volkswagen's almost $15 billion settlement over diesel emissions scandal will affect vehicle owners.
lead_paragraph: The company’s proposed deal includes an offer to buy back or fix faulty diesels — and either way, additional cash compensation of up to $10,000.

headline.main: What the Volkswagen Settlement Could Mean for Car Owners
headline.print_headline: How Settlement May Affect Car Owners

snippet: The company’s proposed deal includes an offer to buy back or fix faulty diesels — and either way, additional cash compensation of up to $10,000.
